org.apache.accumulo.core.client

Class Accumulo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.accumulo.core.client.Accumulo

  • public final class Accumulo
extends Object
    This class contains all API entry points created in 2.0.0 or later. The majority of the API is accessible indirectly via methods in this class. Below are a list of APIs entry points that are not accessible from here.
    • Hadoop input, output formats and partitioners in org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapred and org.apache.accumulo.core.client.mapreduce packages (excluding impl sub-packages).
    • org.apache.accumulo.minicluster.MiniAccumuloCluster Not linkable by javadoc, because in a separate module.
    • Lexicoder and all of its implementations in the same package (excluding the impl sub-package).
    • RFile
    Since:
    2.0.0
    See Also:
    Accumulo Website, Accumulo Public API, Semver 2.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static AccumuloClient.ClientInfoOptions newClient()
      Fluent entry point for creating an AccumuloClient.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • newClient

        public static AccumuloClient.ClientInfoOptions newClient()
        Fluent entry point for creating an AccumuloClient. For example: 
         
    AccumuloClient client = Accumulo.newClient()
      .forInstance(instanceName, zookeepers)
      .usingPassword(user, password)
      .withZkTimeout(1234)
      .build();
        Returns:
        a builder object for Accumulo clients
